pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 950 or AMD RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060 or AMD RX 6500
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x64
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 950 or AMD RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: x64
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060 or AMD RX 6500
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
